sentences.english: The screen capture shows on the right an example of a task presentation.
sentences.chinese: 截圖的右面顯示了一個任務表示的示例。

sentences.english: Avoid hard-coding blank spaces or tabs at the end of a line of sample code.
sentences.chinese: 要避免在示例代碼行的結尾用硬編碼空格或製表符。

sentences.english: A typical example would be colors used for syntax highlighting with an editor.
sentences.chinese: 一個典型示例是用顏色來突出顯示編輯器中的語法。

sentences.english: The example I've included with this post is view-first. The view is created, then the view model attached.
sentences.chinese: 本文中我使用的示例是視圖優先模式。

sentences.english: We will stick with the two-dimensional charts for this example.
sentences.chinese: 對於本示例來說，我們將使用二維圖表。

sentences.english: We have rewritten all the sample scripts to cover the new benchmark.
sentences.chinese: 我們已經重寫了所有示例腳本，以覆蓋新的基準。

sentences.english: Presto, sample sentences and usage examples.
sentences.chinese: 轉眼間，就能看到例句和用法示例。

sentences.english: For the example in this article, I only put implementation inside two methods.
sentences.chinese: 對於本文中的示例，我只將實現放在兩個方法中。

sentences.english: Moreover, the quick example only shows how to poll one time.
sentences.chinese: 此外，本文的示例僅展示瞭如何進行單次輪詢。

sentences.english: Since the example application is a blog, you get to take a shortcut.
sentences.chinese: 因示例應用程序是一個博客，我們可以走個捷徑。

sentences.english: A classic example is mouse buttons.
sentences.chinese: 一個典型的示例就是鼠標鍵。

sentences.english: Here is a sample output of this script.
sentences.chinese: 下面是這個腳本的一個示例輸出。

sentences.english: Consider this example in C# and VB.
I use a verb form in the example.
sentences.chinese: 我在示例中使用的是動詞形式。

sentences.english: This concludes your sample application demonstration.
sentences.chinese: 示例應用程序演示到此結束。

sentences.english: Here is our example with the constraint modifier added.
sentences.chinese: 下面是添加了約束脩飾符的示例。
